ginger noun
(SPICE)
Add to word list

[ U ] the spicy root of a tropical plant that is used in cooking or preserved in sugar, or a powder made from this root, used as a spice: ground ginger Stir the ground (= powdered) ginger and brown sugar into the mixture.crystallized ginger Make sure you chop the crystallized ginger into tiny pieces. ginger biscuits/cake
